have you heard of this thing in cs:go called surfing? you don't rescue hostages, camp chokepoints or anything. heck, most of the time you don't even have guns. there's these huge ramps just floating in mid-air, in these giant box-like rooms with cool skyboxes of sunsets and stuff, and you jump on these ramps. and then you fall off a couple times because you're not very good but suddenly you learn to use a and d to strafe on these ramps and everything changes: the world around you becomes a blur; a sense of peace flies over you like a gentle breeze. time seems to slow down. you glide across these ramps like they're clouds. they begin to form these strange and exciting twists of colour and motion. you become entranced in this kind of fantasy journey on a fractured road to nowhere.

it's pretty neat.
Good game i have play this 4 years ƒ± hope so happy times in this game
